Class MainBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
      • MainBoard
  • public class MainBoard
extends Board
    The MainBoard class implant a class to manage the main board of the game. it's 6*6 board that contains four 3*3 sub boards.
    Since:
    4/4/2020

      • witchSubBoard

        public int[] witchSubBoard​(int x,
                           int y)
        This method receives coordinates of a cell in main board and it determine to witch sub boards it belongs and what's the coordinates of the cell in that sub boards.
        Parameters:
        x - the vertical coordinates of disk
        y - the horizontal coordinates of disk
        Returns:
        An array fist element sub board number second and third element coordinates of disk in sub board
